author: USA TODAY, Doug Stanglin, USA TODAY
title: Where are you required to wear a face mask? More and more states, cities and towns making it a rule
description: A growing number of states, towns and cities are mandating that people wear face masks in public spaces. New York and Maryland just joined that list.
content:
More local governments in the US are requiring customers to wear face masks before entering grocery stores and other essential businesses. (April 15)
AP Domestic
Starting Friday, New Yorkers who can't maintain a social distance from others must wear a face … [+3886 chars]
